Summaries.eng: Live action series based on the manga "Rent-a-Girlfriend".
Summaries.jpn:
バカでクズで非モテ人生まっしぐらの大学生・木ノ下和也（大西流星）は、初めてできた彼女・七海麻美に速攻でフラれた心の傷を癒そうと、半ばヤケクソでレンタル彼女を発注。
すると、顔よしスタイルよし、機転が利いて気遣いもできる理想の彼女・水原千鶴（桜田ひより）がやってくる！レンタル彼女として完ぺきな仕事をこなす千鶴に、和也の男心は刺激されまくり。その反動から、和也はプロすぎる千鶴をつい攻撃してしまい…！和也がさらけ出したダサい本音から、時給で契約を結んだかりそめの恋に思わぬ展開が！？
非モテ大学生の恋物語が始まる！

Aliases: 彼女、お借りします (ドラマ)

Summaries.eng: Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei), an idiot, scumbag and unpopular college student, tries to heal the emotional wounds of being dumped by his first girlfriend, Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori). apply to. Then, his ideal girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada), who is good-looking, good-looking, and caring, arrives! In response, Kazuya unintentionally attacks Chizuru...! Kazuya reveals his lame true feelings, and an unexpected development unfolds in the "rental" love story!?
Summaries.jpn: バカでクズで非モテ人生まっしぐらの大学生･木ノ下和也 (大西流星) は、初めてできた彼女･七海麻美 (秋田汐梨) に速攻でフラれた心の傷を癒そうと、ヤケクソでレンタル彼女をに申し込む。すると、顔よしスタイルよし、気遣いもできる理想の彼女･水原千鶴 (桜田ひより) がやってくる! レンタル彼女として完ぺきな仕事をこなす千鶴に、和也の男心は刺激されまくり。その反動から、和也は千鶴をつい攻撃してしまい…! 和也がさらけ出したダサい本音から、“レンタル”の恋に思わぬ展開が!? 非モテ大学生の“リアル”な恋物語が始まる!

Summaries.eng: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi), who has decided never to see Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) again, starts a virgin campus life with his ex-girlfriend Mami Nanami (Shiori Akita). Ya unexpectedly runs into Chizuru on the university campus! However, Chizuru's outfit was plain and inconspicuous, unimaginable from the time she was a rental girl! ? Chizuru, who wants to hide his rental girlfriend's part-time job, and Kazuya, who relies on rental girlfriend and doesn't want her black history to be known, have the same interests. The two agree to stay as complete strangers. However, when Kazuya returns to the apartment where he is lodging, Chizuru, who for some reason is plainly dressed, is in the next room. Surprisingly, the two were next-door neighbors in the apartment! ! ! A few days later, Kazuya's grandmother, Kazu (Kino Hana), visits Kazuya's room.
Summaries.jpn:
もう二度と水原千鶴（桜田ひより）には会わないと心に決めた木ノ下和也（大西流星）が、元カノの七海麻美（秋田汐梨）に未練タラタラの童貞キャンパスライフをスタートさせた矢先、和也は大学構内で予期せず千鶴に遭遇する！
だが、千鶴の出で立ちはレンタル彼女の時からは想像もできない、地味で目立たないものだった！？
レンタル彼女のバイトを隠したい千鶴と、レンタル彼女に頼った黒歴史を知られたくない和也の利害は一致。２人は赤の他人として過ごすことに同意する。ところが、和也が下宿先のアパートに帰ると、隣の部屋になぜか地味な格好をした千鶴が…。なんと、２人はアパートの隣人同士だったのだ！！！
数日後、和也の部屋に祖母の和（木野花）が訪ねてくる。千鶴を和也の彼女と信じている和は、入院中の病院からわざわざ外出許可を取り、生まれてこの方モテたことがない孫にやっとできた彼女に会いに来たのだ。和也は、千鶴との約束通り、すでに別れたと伝えようとするが…。

Summaries.eng: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) gets completely drunk at a drinking party where his ex-girlfriend Asami Nanami (Shiori Akita) and rental girlfriend Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) are together. As she gets older, she becomes aware of her strong regrets and becomes unable to suppress her sexual desires. However, as soon as he heard Asami say bad things about Chizuru, he took Chizuru's shoulder and scolded Asami. Her favorite is Asami, but she doesn't want to hurt Chizuru. Later, when Kazuya goes to the beach with his university friends, including Asami, he encounters Chizuru in plain "Ichinose" clothes. Fortunately, no one realizes that Ichinose is Kazuya's girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara, but Kazuya, who was excited by Asami in a swimsuit and was determined to check Asami's feelings today, panicked. As a result, Kazuya pulls Chizuru into a private room in the bathroom, but Asami arrives and opens the door...! ?
Summaries.jpn:
元カノの七海麻美（秋田汐梨）とレンタル彼女の水原千鶴（桜田ひより）が同席する羽目になった飲み会で、すっかり酔っ払ってしまった木ノ下和也（大西流星）は、麻美から優しく介抱されるうちに強い未練を自覚し、性的欲求を抑えきれなくなる。ところが、麻美が千鶴を悪く言うのを聞いた途端、今度は千鶴の肩を持ち麻美をいさめてしまう。本命は麻美、でも千鶴を傷つけたくはない…そんな混乱状態の和也に対し千鶴は、和也が予想もしなかった言葉をかける。
後日、和也は麻美を含む大学の仲間と出かけたビーチで、地味な“一ノ瀬”姿の千鶴と遭遇する。幸い誰も一ノ瀬が和也の“彼女”の水原千鶴とは気づかないが、水着姿の麻美に興奮して今日こそ麻美の気持ちを確かめようと意気込んでいた和也はパニックに。その成り行きから、和也はトイレの個室に千鶴を引っ張り込んでしまうのだが、やってきた麻美がその個室のドアを開け…！？

Summaries.eng: While on a trip with college friends, Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei) is suddenly kissed by his ex-girlfriend Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori). Asami buries her face in Kazuya's chest, saying, "I can't stand it anymore." In Kazuya's mind, unable to move due to the shock, the thoughts of Asami, who he once decided to be his "fated person," vividly revive. Kazuya hides his turmoil and returns to Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) group. Then, in a punishment game, I feel like I'm going to be forced to kiss Chizuru! I can't do that in front of Asami. However, Chizuru, who has a high level of professionalism as her rental girlfriend, quietly closes her eyes towards Kazuya. Chizuru's lips approached little by little. Kazuya desperately thinks of a way to settle the situation. And Kazuya, who has made up his mind, finally speaks those words. However, when Yoshiaki Kibe (Shunya Kaneko) hears this, he suddenly attacks Kazuya...! ?
Summaries.jpn:
大学仲間との旅行中、木ノ下和也（大西流星）は元カノの七海麻美（秋田汐梨）から突然キスをされる。「我慢できなくなっちゃった」と和也の胸に顔を埋めてくる麻美。あまりの衝撃に身動き一つできない和也の脳裏には、かつて“運命の人”と決めた麻美への思いが鮮烈によみがえってくる…。
動揺を隠し水原千鶴（桜田ひより）たちの輪に戻る和也。すると、今度は罰ゲームで千鶴とキスさせられそうな状況に！麻美が見ている前でそんなことはできない。だが、レンタル彼女として高いプロ意識を持つ千鶴は、和也に向かって静かに瞳を閉じる。少しずつ近づいてくる千鶴の唇。必死でその場を収める方法を考える和也。そして意を決した和也は、ついにあの言葉を口にする。ところが、それを聞いた木部芳秋（金子隼也）は、いきなり和也に殴りかかり…！？

Summaries.eng: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) jumps into the sea to save Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) who has fallen from a pleasure boat, and manages to rescue her. However, he himself lost consciousness. For Kazuya's sake, Chizuru gives him a heart massage and artificial respiration. Thanks to that, Kazuya regains his consciousness safely, but Kazuya's feelings are confused again when Chizuru, who is a customer, even performs artificial respiration. Even though the time for the two to terminate their contract is getting closer and closer, Kazuya, who recalls the events since he met Chizuru one by one, finally realizes his true feelings of "non-returnable". …. Meanwhile, Kazuya is introduced to her by her friend Shun Kuribayashi (Kosuke Suzuki). Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo), Shun's girlfriend whom he meets for the first time, is a beautiful girl as beautiful as Chizuru, but Kazuya recognizes her face...
Summaries.jpn:
遊覧船から転落した水原千鶴（桜田ひより）を助けるため、後先構わず海に飛び込んだ木ノ下和也（大西流星）は、どうにか千鶴の救助に成功する。だが、自身は意識を喪失。そんな和也のため、今度は千鶴が心臓マッサージと人工呼吸を施す。その甲斐あって、和也は無事に意識を取り戻すが、客である自分に人工呼吸までしてくれる千鶴に対し、和也の気持ちはまたしても混乱。2人が契約を解消する時は刻々と近づいているというのに、千鶴と出会ってからの出来事を一つずつ思い返す和也は、ついに、“返却不可”な自分の本当の気持ちに気づいてしまう…。
そんな中、和也は友人の栗林駿（鈴木康介）から彼女を紹介される。初めて会う駿の彼女の更科瑠夏（工藤美桜）は、千鶴に劣らぬ美少女だったが、和也はその顔に見覚えがあり…。

Summaries.eng: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo), who sees that Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) is a rental girlfriend, asks Chizuru, who continues to take the attitude of a real lover, to kiss Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei)! For both Kazuya's sake and myself, I absolutely want to avoid having Ruka reveal the truth to Kuribayashi Shun (Suzuki Kosuke). Thinking that, Chizuru puts her hand on Kazuya's cheek, which shows her impatience, and kisses her lips... After that, Kazuya, who is nervous about when Shun will tell her, secretly follows Ruka after the double date. However, Ruka ambushed Kazuya. Kazuya has no words to respond to her accusation, "Are you going to be a stalker after pretending to be a lover?" Still, Kazuya, who wants a pledge from Ruka not to disperse to her surroundings, continues to seriously bow his head knowing her selfishness. Ruka leaves Kazuya with shocking words and runs off...!
Summaries.jpn:
水原千鶴（桜田ひより）をレンタル彼女だと見抜いた更科瑠夏（工藤美桜）は、あくまでも本当の恋人同士との態度を取り続ける千鶴に、木ノ下和也（大西流星）とのキスを求める！　和也のためにも自分のためにも、瑠夏から栗林駿（鈴木康介）に真実をバラされることだけは絶対に避けたい。そう考えた千鶴は、焦りの色を浮かべる和也の頬に手を当て、唇を…。
その後も、いつ駿に告げ口されるかとヒヤヒヤな和也は、ダブルデート終了後、こっそり瑠夏の後をつける。ところが、瑠夏はそんな和也を待ち伏せ。「恋人偽装の次はストーカーですか？」との非難に和也は返す言葉もなく、結果的に千鶴とのレンタル関係を認めることになってしまう。それでも、瑠夏から周囲にバラさないとの誓約が欲しい和也は、身勝手を承知で真剣に頭を下げ続ける。そんな和也に瑠夏は衝撃の言葉を残して走り去る…！

Summaries.eng: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) confesses to Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi), but he refuses without lying about his feelings for Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada). To such two people, Ruka presents an exchange condition that "She will keep quiet that Chizuru is a rental girlfriend if she does it." Ruka had a reason for her to fall in love with Kazuya, but for Kazuya, it was nothing more than a threat. However, he can't leave Ruka who breaks down in tears without hesitation in her eyes, and Ruka becomes Kazuya's "girlfriend (provisional)"! In order to prevent Ruka from getting serious and Chizuru's identity to be exposed, the trial relationship is extremely harsh. In order to avoid being “lover-like” with Ruka as much as possible, Kazuya lies and refuses her invitation to a fireworks display. On the day of the fireworks display, Kazuya sees Chizuru in town. Fashionable Chizuru joins handsome. Is the man a business partner or...?
Summaries.jpn:
更科瑠夏（工藤美桜）から告白された木ノ下和也（大西流星）は、その唐突さと真剣さにたじろぎつつも、水原千鶴（桜田ひより）への気持ちに嘘はつけず、懸命に断る。そんな二人に対し瑠夏は、「彼女にしてくれれば千鶴がレンタル彼女であることを黙っている」との交換条件を提示する。瑠夏にはここまで和也に入れ込むだけの理由があったが、和也にとっては脅し文句も同然。ただ、人目をはばからず泣き崩れる瑠夏を放っておけず、瑠夏は和也の“彼女（仮）”になる！
瑠夏をこれ以上本気にさせず、千鶴の身バレも防ぐためのお試し関係は過酷を極める。電話やSNSでのやり取り以外、瑠夏とはなるべく“恋人らしい”ことを避けるため、誘われた花火大会も嘘をついて断る和也。その花火大会当日、和也は街中で千鶴を見かける。おしゃれしている千鶴はイケメンと合流。男は仕事相手か、それとも…？本当の千鶴を知りたい欲求に駆られた和也は、二人を尾行するが…。

Summaries.eng: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) jumps into her heart and says, “I can’t stand it anymore!” Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) pushes Ruka down, as if to say that he is the one who can’t stand it…! Imagine such a scene. In reality, Ruka manages to hold on, but unlike her rental girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada), who can't cross the line, she sneaks up on Kazuya, saying that she's ready to have sex... ! On the other hand, Chizuru invites Kazuya to the veranda at night instead of work. Kazuya is obsessed with a naughty delusion with Chizuru, this time with a different development. However, Chizuru unexpectedly asks him to rent a certain woman. When Kazuya listens to her wish and heads to the meeting place, there is a transcendent beautiful girl again! However, she has a personality that is not suitable for rental...! ?
Summaries.jpn:
「もう我慢できません！」と胸に飛び込んでくる更科瑠夏（工藤美桜）に、木ノ下和也（大西流星）は、我慢できないのは自分だと言わんばかりに瑠夏を押し倒す…！そんなシーンを妄想。現実にはどうにか踏みとどまるが、瑠夏は、一線を越えられないレンタル彼女の水原千鶴（桜田ひより）と違って、自分はエッチする覚悟ができていると、和也にさらににじり寄り…！
一方の千鶴は、和也を仕事ではなくプライベートで夜のベランダに誘う。これまでと違う展開に、今度は千鶴とのイケナイ妄想に取り憑かれる和也。しかし、千鶴からはある女性をレンタルしてほしいとの意外な相談を持ちかけられる。その願いを聞き入れ、和也が待ち合わせ場所に向かうと、そこにはまたしても超絶美少女が！だが、彼女はレンタル不適合な性格の持ち主だった…！？

Summaries.eng: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) was told by Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) that he was thinking of quitting his rental girlfriend. Although he is depressed, he is prepared to say goodbye to Chizuru soon, and decides to face Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) seriously in order to create her true girlfriend so that her grandmother will not be sad if Chizuru is gone. Kazuya rediscovers the bright and dedicated charm of Ruka when he goes on a date like a lover, which he has avoided until now. Chizuru crossed my mind many times along with the question, "Why is this girl no good...?" At that moment, Kazuya sees Chizuru and Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori) entering a room in the box! ? Kazuya ignores his confession to Ruka and tries to find out how the two of them are doing...
Summaries.jpn:
水原千鶴（桜田ひより）からレンタル彼女を辞めようと思っていると打ち明けられた木ノ下和也（大西流星）。気落ちしつつも千鶴との別れが近いことを覚悟し、千鶴がいなくなっても祖母が悲しまないよう、本当の彼女を作るべく更科瑠夏（工藤美桜）と真剣に向き合うと決める。
これまで避けきた恋人らしいデートをし、明るくひたむきな瑠夏の魅力を再認識する和也。「なんでこの子じゃダメなんだろう…」という自問とともに、千鶴のことが何度も頭をよぎるが、そんな思いを断ち切って、カラオケボックスで一緒にバイト中の瑠夏に、いよいよ「お試し」ではなく「正式」な彼女になってほしいと言いかけたその時、和也の視界にボックスの一室に入っていく千鶴と七海麻美（秋田汐梨）の姿が！？和也は、瑠夏への告白もそっちのけに2人の様子を探ろうとするが…。

Summaries.eng: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) is suddenly asked by Asami Nanami (Shiori Akita) to pretend to be her boyfriend and meet her parents. Unable to let go of his ex-girlfriend, who seems to have some circumstances behind him, he decides to cancel his previous rental date with Mizuhara Chizuru (Sakurada Hiyori). Knowing it or not, Asami goes to Chizuru and she advises him not to interfere with her relationship with Kazuya. On the day of the appointment, when Kazuya goes out to dinner with Asami's parents as a fake boyfriend, Chizuru happens to be serving customers at the restaurant! Kazuya is nervous about Asami's strict-looking father, but keeps an eye on Chizuru's movements so that he won't be noticed. The situation looks different from the usual Chizuru. In fact, Chizuru was dealing with a customer with an excuse due to a mistake by her dispatch company. On the other hand, Chizuru, who left the store first, was approaching a certain danger.
Summaries.jpn:
七海麻美（秋田汐梨）から突然、彼氏のフリをして両親に会ってほしいと頼まれた木ノ下和也（大西流星）。事情がありそうな元カノを放ってくことができず、先約の水原千鶴（桜田ひより）とのレンタル・デートをキャンセルすることに。それを知ってか知らずか、麻美は千鶴のもとへ向かうと、和也との関係を邪魔しないようにと忠告し…。
約束の日、和也が偽物の彼氏として麻美の両親との食事会に出かけると、その店には偶然にも接客中の千鶴が！厳格そうな麻美の父に緊張しつつも、気づかれないよう千鶴の動向をうかがう和也。その様子は、いつもの千鶴とは違って見える。実は、千鶴は派遣会社の手違いで、いわく付きの客を相手していたのだ…。
重たい空気の食事会にあって、和也は懸命に役割を果たそうと努力する。一方、先に店を出た千鶴には、ある危険が迫ろうとしていた…！！
